name: ClassicalRadio(unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, tell classical radio play Mozart”
”Alexa, tell classical radio play Tchaikovsky”
”Alexa, tell classical radio play Vivaldi”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: classical radio
des:
With this skill you can play all radio streams of Classical Radio directly on your amazon echo. But to use it, a premium account of Classical Radio is absolutely neccessary. Cannot be used with the free account.

When activating this skill you need to configure account linking. There you have to enter the listen key. The listen key can be found on the Classical Radio page on "Player Settings".
